title: Music Library System with Modules
description: Create a music library system demonstrating Rust's module system. Define modules for organizing music and playlists, control visibility with pub, and use paths to access items.

tests.name: Music library system with modules
tests.expected:
Playlist: Classic Rock contains 2 songs
Song: Bohemian Rhapsody by Queen (5:55)
Song: Hotel California by Eagles (6:30)
Playing: Bohemian Rhapsody by Queen
Playing: Hotel California by Eagles
Total duration: 12:25

hints: Define a mod library with pub mod music and pub mod playlists submodules
In music module, define a pub struct Song with pub fields and methods
In playlists module, define a pub struct Playlist with pub methods
Use use statements to bring items into scope in main
Create Song instances and add them to a Playlist
